name: Quaver Mapset
summary: Learn about .QP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In Quaver, players press buttons in time to music to complete levels. The game includes an Editor that allows players to create their own levels. Levels consist of an MP3 file and one or more associated QUA files, known as beatmaps, that determine when notes appear on-screen. Each QUA file stores data for a different difficulty and can be edited separately in the Quaver Editor.

When a player exports a level from the Editor, it is saved as a QP file, also known as a Quaver mapset. Each QP file contains all of a level's QUA files, as well as its MP3 file. Players often export QP files from Quaver or upload them to QuaverGame.com to share the levels they've made with other players.

description: A QP file is a mapset used by Quaver, a free rhythm game available for Windows and macOS. It contains an .MP3 file and one or more .QUA files. Players frequently download QP files from QuaverGame.com.

instructions: You can open a QP file in Quaver (Windows, Mac). To do so, open Quaver and drag the file into the game. The mapset your QP file contains will then be selectable in-game as both a playable and editable level.
